nodes.description: 自杀式袭击者携带装满铁钉的炸弹在巴格达征兵中心等待数小时
nodes.support_text: Suicide bomber with nail-packed explosives strapped to his body sat for hours with a group of unsuspecting Iraqi Army recruits Tuesday before he detonated his deadly bombs

nodes.description: 7:30 a.m.袭击者引爆炸弹，造成61人死亡（含袭击者）和100余人受伤
nodes.support_text: detonated his deadly bombs around 7:30 a.m.

nodes.description: 幸存者描述现场血肉横飞，肢体碎片和血泊覆盖征兵中心
nodes.support_text: Sixty-one Iraqis and the bomber were instantly torn to shreds and more than a 100 others were wounded by a blast that painted the walls of a Baghdad recruitment center red with blood.

nodes.description: 袭击者伪装成普通应征者，利用军官收集证件的时机实施爆炸
nodes.support_text: waited until an officer arrived to collect the identification cards of the recruits before setting off his bombs

nodes.description: 伊拉克军方确认袭击由 AQI（基地组织伊拉克分支）策划
nodes.support_text: 伊拉克军方发言人 Maj. Gen. Qassim al-Moussawi blamed Al Qaeda in Iraq

nodes.description: 袭击成为2007年以来最严重恐袭，质疑伊拉克军队控制力
nodes.support_text: It was the bloodiest terror attack his year and cast serious doubts on whether Iraqi forces are capable of controlling their unruly country as the U.S. ends its combat mission on Sept. 1.

nodes.description: 幸存者阿里拒绝离开现场，坚持领取沾满血迹的申请文件
nodes.support_text: Ali and some of the other survivors tried to retrieve their blood-stained documents and applications from inside the recruitment center.

nodes.description: 伊拉克军方发言人将事件归咎于 AQI 领导的逊尼派极端分子
nodes.support_text: blamed Al Qaeda in Iraq, an insurgent group loyal to Osama Bin Laden and led mostly by non-Iraqis

nodes.description: 自杀式袭击者针对伊拉克军队新兵发动自杀式爆炸袭击
nodes.support_text: Suicide bomber targeted Iraqi army recruits with nail-packed explosives

nodes.description: 伊拉克人和炸弹袭击者被瞬间撕裂成碎片
nodes.support_text: Sixty-one Iraqis and the bomber were instantly torn to shreds

nodes.description: 爆炸将巴格达征兵中心的墙壁染成血红色
nodes.support_text: blast painted the walls of a Baghdad recruitment center red with blood

nodes.description: 目击者声称男子在炸弹爆炸前的整个行动过程
nodes.support_text: Witnesses claimed the man waited until an officer arrived to collect the identification cards of the recruits before setting off his bombs
An officer arrived to collect the identification cards of the recruits

nodes.description: 伊拉克人正在努力争取进入陆军的机会
nodes.support_text: Iraqis were actively seeking opportunities to get into the Army

nodes.description: 伊拉克人试图进入陆军
nodes.support_text: Iraqis attempted to enter the Army
